params.name: do_resize
params.description: Whether to resize the shorter edge of the input to a certain size.

params.name: size
params.description: 768, width: 768}):The size to use for resizing the image. Only has an effect if do_resize is set to True. If size is asequence like (h, w), output size will be matched to this. If size is an int, then image will be resizedto (size, size).

params.name: resample
params.description: An optional resampling filter. This can be one of PIL.Image.Resampling.NEAREST,PIL.Image.Resampling.BOX, PIL.Image.Resampling.BILINEAR, PIL.Image.Resampling.HAMMING,PIL.Image.Resampling.BICUBIC or PIL.Image.Resampling.LANCZOS. Only has an effect if do_resize is setto True.

params.name: do_center_crop
params.description: Whether to crop the input at the center. If the input size is smaller than crop_size along any edge, theimage is padded with 0s and then center cropped.

params.name: crop_size
params.description: 768, width: 768}):The size to use for center cropping the image. Only has an effect if do_center_crop is set to True.

params.name: do_rescale
params.description: Whether to rescale the input by a certain factor.

params.name: rescale_factor
params.description: The factor to use for rescaling the image. Only has an effect if do_rescale is set to True.

params.name: do_normalize
params.description: Whether or not to normalize the input with image_mean and image_std. Desired output size when applyingcenter-cropping. Only has an effect if do_center_crop is set to True.

params.name: image_mean
params.description: The sequence of means for each channel, to be used when normalizing images.

params.name: image_std
params.description: The sequence of standard deviations for each channel, to be used when normalizing images.
